document.full_text: lockheed martin, the pentagon's no. 1 supplier, is experiencing a major disruption to its computer systems that could be related to a problem with network security, a defense official and two sources familiar with the issue said on thursday.
document.title: lockheed network hit by major disruption: sources
lines_and_colors: lockheed martin, the pentagon's no. 1 supplier, is experiencing a major disruption to its computer systems that could be related to a problem with network security, a defense official and two sources familiar with the issue said on thursday.
